TopicTitle: Quick question about forum post edit function

Articles.Content:
What is the exact amount of time allowed for someone to post something, and then edit it, without having their post tagged with an edit timestamp?

I just need to know to draft rules for my [forum game](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110598-The-number-war-Count-to-100-or-100) which may require some accountability over editing process, especially within this time limit.
